refnamediv.refpurpose: Turns page numbers in xrefs to paragraphs on and off

refsection.para: The value of this parameter determines if cross references (xrefs) to paragraphs in printed output will include page number citations.
Historically, cross references to paragraphs included page number citations unconditionally, regardless of the insert.xref.page.number value.

listitem.para: Page number references will be generated for paragraphs.
Whether page number references are generated for an xref element referring to a paragraph will be controlled by the insert.xref.page.number rules.
